title: The rebel who defied William the Conqueror
itunes:title: The rebel who defied William the Conqueror
itunes:subtitle: Matt Lewis tells Spencer Mizen about the extraordinary escapades of Hereward the Wake, who led a rebellion in the 1070s that drove William the Conqueror and the Normans to distraction.
description:
Matt Lewis tells Spencer Mizen about the extraordinary escapades of Hereward the Wake, who led a rebellion in the 1070s that drove William the Conqueror and the Normans to distraction.

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
